description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTYellowfeverYellowFever for IMMZ.D2.DT.Yellow fever. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a yellow fever vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) in any Table: IMMZ.D2.DT.Yellow fever
